      • isLoaded

        public boolean isLoaded()
        This indicates the status of the configuration loading. YES if it has successfully loaded and is ready for use. NO if not yet loaded or perhaps an error has occurred during attempting to load.

        public java.net.URL getGatewayUrl()
        The full URL of the Gateway including the prefix, hostname and port in a ://: format.

      • getLocationIsRequired

        public boolean getLocationIsRequired()
        Determines if a user’s location coordinates are required. This read only value is within the JSON configuration file and is set as a requirement of the application on the Gateway. This means that a set of location coordinates must be sent in the header of all protected endpoint HTTP request to the API on the Gateway.

      • isEnabledPublicKeyPinning

        public boolean isEnabledPublicKeyPinning()
        Determines if the SDK is enabled for public key pinning for an authentication challenge. This read only value is within the JSON configuration file.

      • isEnabledTrustedPublicPKI

        public boolean isEnabledTrustedPublicPKI()
        Determines if the SDK will trust the public PKI for an authentication challenge. This read only value is within the JSON configuration file.

      • isSsoEnabled

        public boolean isSsoEnabled()
        Determines if the client’s SSO is enabled or not. This value is read from JSON configuration, if there is no value defined in keychain.

      • getEndpointPath

        public java.lang.String getEndpointPath(java.lang.String key)
        Retrieves an endpoint path fragment for a given endpoint key, the keys can be one of the following
        • msso.url.request_token
        • msso.url.request_token_sso
        • msso.url.register_device
        • msso.url.register_device_client
        • msso.url.resource_owner_logout
        • msso.url.remove_device_x509
        • msso.url.authorize
        • msso.url.enterprise_apps
        • msso.url.client_credentials
        • msso.url.authorize
        • mas.url.scim_path
        • mas.url.mas_storage_path
        • mas.url.user_info

      • setCertificateAdvancedRenewTimeframe

      • getCertificateAdvancedRenewTimeframe

        public int getCertificateAdvancedRenewTimeframe()

      • addSecurityConfiguration

        public void addSecurityConfiguration(MASSecurityConfiguration securityConfiguration)
        Adds the security configuration to the list of configurations and notifies observers.
        Parameters:
        securityConfiguration - the configuration to be added

      • removeSecurityConfiguration

        public void removeSecurityConfiguration(android.net.Uri uri)
        Attempts to remove the security configuration from the list of configurations with the host and port information and notifies observers.
        Parameters:
        uri - the URI of the configuration to remove

      • getSecurityConfiguration

        public MASSecurityConfiguration getSecurityConfiguration(android.net.Uri uri)
        Returns a MASSecurityConfiguration object for the specified domain.
        Parameters:
        uri - the full URI
        Returns:
        the host and port URI
